name: H.O.A. Homeowners Association
description:
H.O.A. Homeowners Association

As the property manger for Main St. in Pixel City you must maintain the grass and garbage for each of the 4 house on the street. Otherwise they will start to leave the neighborhood! And if all your neighbors leave, well There Goes the Neighborhood! As well each neighbor will have something to say based on your performance. Good Luck!

A very simple Sim City style management game made for the 2016 Winnipeg Game Jam with the them "There goes the neighborhood!"

Controls (Keyboard)
Movement: WASD
Action: E

Credits
Programming: Daniel Voth (@hyperscope)
Programming: Abdi Abidov (@AbdiumusPrime)
Art: Dillon Prefontaine (@DGPrefontain)
Music provided by: Julian Beutel (@julianbeutel)

Made with Unity
